name: sms
description: SMS, developed by Heron CS LTD, is a comprehensive web-based application designed to streamline the management of subcontractors in construction projects. It facilitates efficient data entry, automates monthly returns for CIS/HMRC compliance, tracks payments, manages deductions, and enables subcontractor verification. SMS ensures accurate record-keeping, regulatory compliance, and effective communication among project stakeholders, enhancing overall subcontractor management efficiency and transparency.
